channel.title: Shaun the sheep on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Shaun the sheep on Game6r

item.title: Game Shaun the Sheep on a hang glider
item.description: This game is for connoisseurs of logic puzzles. Your task is simply to assemble a picture from a variety of fragments, which depicts Shaun the Sheep and his friends. To restore the image, use the left mouse button. Grab the desired fragment with the cursor and drag it to the playing field. Try to keep within the allotted time.

item.title: Game Sheep go home in Paris
item.description: During the game “Sheep go home in Paris” users will have to do the construction of the city. To do this, they have at their disposal a workshop where you can choose what you want to build at the moment. You can complete tasks or play in free mode. Use the mouse to control.
